title: GHL SEO Wordpress Expert
job_overview:
I'm looking for a reliable Virtual Assistant to join our team. The role involves creating and managing websites and handling SEO using GoHighLevel (GHL). You’ll also help migrate websites from WordPress to GHL and use GHL’s SEO tools to improve client websites.

Responsibilities
* Build high end Wordpress websites
* Migrate websites from other wordpress platform to GHL and manage
* Provide Complete SEO services for the website including keyword research, on-page, off-page and technical SEO
* Reporting
* Communicate with the team to meet client needs and deadlines.

Skills
* Good English communication skills for team and client interaction.
* Punctual and self motivated, proactive worker who thinks outside of the box and get things done 

Essential Experience
* GHL
*Wordpress, Elementor, afrefs / semrush / Search Atlas
* HTML and CSS Expereince

If you feel the right fit, please apply.
